alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 27 at 2:02PM CDT until March 28 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM CDT /9 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains in Texas. * WHEN...From 10 PM CDT /9 PM MDT/ this evening to 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS... Damaging winds may blow down power lines leading to power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Motorists driving high profile vehicles should delay traveling until the high winds diminish. Traveling through Guadalupe Pass will be particularly hazardous.
